other_tests.procedure_name: Ultrasound of the liver or gallbladder
other_tests.findings: The gallbladder is distended, full of homogeneous sludge. The gallbladder wall is slightly edematous. The common duct is borderline in size, measuring 7 mm. There is equivocal intrahepatic biliary ductal prominence.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The distension and contents are probably not significantly changed from the prior CT.
